protein.specific_function: Sodium-dependent and purine-selective transporter. Exhibits the transport characteristics of the nucleoside transport system cif or N1 subtype (N1/cif) (selective for purine nucleosides and uridine). Plays a critical role in specific uptake and salvage of purine nucleosides in kidney and other tissues.

go_class.description: nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid transmembrane transporter activity
